summary: DT*: THE CONTACT STATED WHILE DRIVING 30 MPH, THERE WAS A CLUNKING NOISE COMING FROM UNDER THE VEHICLE WHENEVER IT WAS DRIVEN OVER AN UNEVEN SURFACE.  THIS WAS ACCOMPANIED BY LOOSENESS IN THE STEERING.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A SERVICE DEALER, WHO DETERMINED THE FRONT SWAY LINKS AND BUSHINGS NEEDED REPLACEMENT.  THE PARTS WERE REPLACED, WHICH CORRECTED THE PROBLEM.
